sn45.70:4.2: “Mendicants, one thing helps give rise to the noble eightfold path.
sn45.70:4.6: A mendicant with good friends can expect to
sn45.70:4.7: develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path.
sn45.70:4.8: And how does a mendicant with good friends develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
sn45.70:4.9: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness,
sn45.70:4.10: and right samādhi culminating in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion.
sn45.70:4.11: That’s how a mendicant with good friends develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
